Release.Notes:
New from 0.0.4 release: * Due to incorrect release, Exiv2 0.20 was not properly linked to 0.0.4 Windows version. This release fixes all previous Exiv2 0.19 bugs mentioned in 0.0.4 (TIFF file corruption etc.)
New from 0.0.3 release: * Move to Exiv2 0.20 - fixed several critical issues (TIFF file truncation) - updated makernotes and TIFF tags - support for new XMP schemas - see http://www.exiv2.org/changelog.html for more details * Bugfixes - new library is now working properly - time and date metadata tags are now displayed properly - UI fixes
New from 0.0.2 release: * Support for DNG, Photoshop PSD, JPEG2000 and camera raw formats * Fixed several crashes * Bugfixes
New from 0.0.1 release: * Fix default library access error on Vista/7
New from 0.0beta release: * Change online version check behaviour * UI redesign * New AnalogExif tags: Lens serial number, Film grain and Develop process * Online help * Bugfixes

New from 0.0.3 release (see CHANGES for complete list): * Move to Exiv2 0.20 - fixed several critical issues (TIFF file truncation) - updated makernotes and TIFF tags - support for new XMP schemas - see http://www.exiv2.org/changelog.html for more details * Bugfixes - new library is now working properly - time and date metadata tags are now displayed properly - UI fixes
New from 0.0.1 release: * Support for DNG, Photoshop PSD, JPEG2000 and camera raw formats * Handle APEX aperture tags properly (e.g. Maximum aperture) * Fixed several crashes * Bugfixes
